biotools.summary: This database collects predicted drug targets in 150 pathogen species. The structural details of the drug mode of binding are also provided. Predictions are made using the information coming from drug-target three-dimensional complexes and by exploiting the homology relationships of known drug targets with pathogen proteins. Predicted pathogen targets are further annotated with sequence, structural and functional information.

bioschemas.name: TiPs
